C

Command - Interface in fr.istic.aco.editor.Interface
The Command interface defines the structure for all commands in the editor.
CopyCommand - Class in fr.istic.aco.editor.ConcreteCommand
The CopyCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for copying the currently selected text in the engine.

Constructs an CopyCommand with the specified engine and invoker.

Copies the text within the interval specified by the selection control object into the clipboard.

Copies the text within the interval specified by the selection control object into the clipboard.

Engine - Interface in fr.istic.aco.editor.Interface
Main API for the text editing engine
EngineImpl - Class in fr.istic.aco.editor.ClasseImpl
Implementation of the Engine interface that provides text editing functionalities such as inserting, cutting, copying, pasting, and deleting text within a buffer.
EngineImpl() - Constructor for class fr.istic.aco.editor.ClasseImpl.EngineImpl
Constructs an EngineImpl object with an empty buffer, empty clipboard, and a new selection.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.ConcreteCommand.CopyCommand
Executes the copy command by invoking the copy operation on the engine.

Executes the cut command by invoking the cut operation on the engine.

Executes the delete command by invoking the delete operation on the engine.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.ConcreteCommand.InsertCommand
Executes the insert command by retrieving the text from the invoker and inserting it into the engine.

Executes the paste command by invoking the paste operation on the engine.
execute() - Method in class fr.istic.aco.editor.ConcreteCommand.SelectionCommand
